channel.title: Homes on Aditya Chetan @ IIITD
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Aditya Chetan @ IIITD

item.description: Biography I am a an undergraduate student at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi, studying Computer Science and Applied Mathematics. I am always looking to learn more about topics in Computer Science. I enjoy working on multi-disciplinary projects and am always looking to build collaborations with new people from different disciplines. Currently, I am a part of Laboratory of Computational Social Systems at IIIT Delhi. I have been working on detecting collusive activities in online social networks.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: I am a Third-year undergraduate student at IIIT Delhi. My research interests are in Deep Learning and its applications in different disciplines, from Linguistics to Online Social Networks to Neuroscience. I dabbled with software development in my freshman year, and interned at Microsoft IGD. But by my second year I got interested in Deep Learning and Data Science and moved on to do research projects in these fields. I have had the chance to work with mentors from IBM India Research Laboratory.
